price: پرته د جهنم له لارې چې هلته پكې تلپاتي وي ابدي او دا خو الله ته (ډېره) اسانه ده.
arabic: إِلَّا طَرِيقَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: illā ṭarīqa jahannama khālidīna fīhā abadan wakāna dhālika ʿalā al-lahi yasīran
